Summary: 2 bright lights flashed about 5 seconds appart no noise but lit up sky
divs: Sighting Detailslet my dog out in my garden as I looked up the first flash caught my eye then 5 seconds later another very bright flash lit up the sky.It was about ten times as bright and large as the nearest star which was easy to see as there was no clouds don't know what this was I have never seen anything like this I hope someone has seen something similar as I would love to know what this was.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bristol
There were no other sightings in Bristol on or around September 10th 2013
